example.eg: This is a direct route to the airport.
He is a direct descendant of Thomas Jefferson.
example.egtrans: 他是托马斯·杰佛逊的直系子孙。

example.eg: The positive slope of this graph indicates a direct relationship between the x and y variables.
example.egtrans: 该图中的正斜线表明x和y函数之间成正比关系。

example.eg: He was direct with her and told her that she had to stop.
example.egtrans: 他跟她很坦率，直白地要求她停手。

example.eg: This was a direct result of his actions on Tuesday.
example.egtrans: 这是他周二行为的直接后果。

example.eg: Please give me a direct answer.  "Yes" or "no"?
example.egtrans: 请给我个直截了当的答复。“是”还是“不是”？

example.eg: I flew to Paris direct.
The marketing campaign was directed at young women.
example.egtrans: 营销活动瞄准的是年轻女性。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将某物瞄准某人, 将某物对准某人

example.eg: The supervisor was directing a trainee to operate the machine.
example.egtrans: 主管正指导一位实习生操作机器。

example.eg: He had a direct conversation with her.
They're twins, but they're direct opposites in character.
We need to keep track of all direct and indirect costs associated with the merger.
The direct translation for "book" in French is "livre."
Her friends said that she should tell him direct that she liked him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直接地, 直截了当地

example.eg: The police were directing traffic away from the street where they were repairing the gas leak.
The man directed his children to clean the house.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 指挥某人做某事, 指示某人做某事

example.eg: After many years as an actor, he wanted to direct.
The CEO directed the company.
example.egtrans: 公司由首席执行官管理。

example.eg: The teacher directed the students to study quietly while she stepped out into the hallway for a moment.
example.egtrans: 老师要离开教室一会儿，要求学生们静静自习。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 命令, 指挥, 要求

example.eg: He directed the orchestra.
Who directed "Gone with the Wind"?
Can you please direct me to the museum?
example.egtrans: 你能告诉我博物馆在哪个方向吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 给…指示方向, 为…指路

example.eg: He directed Peter O'Toole in "Lawrence of Arabia".

trans_examp.trans_cn: 指挥（某个演员）, 给…当导演

example.eg: The politician directed his speech at undecided voters.
To whom shall I direct the letter?
You should direct your criticisms to the person responsible.
example.egtrans: 你应该批评那个该负责任的人。

example.eg: The trainer directed her in the best way to lift weights.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在（某个方面）为…提供指导

example.eg: The professor directed his comments to the two noisy girls in the back of the classroom.
She has direct access to the prime minister.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直接接触某人的渠道, 直接接近某人的渠道

example.eg: A gate at the end of the garden gives direct access to the beach.

dsense.name: direct attention to [sth/sb], direct [sb]'s attention to [sth/sb]

example.eg: I'd like to direct your attention to the graph at the top of Page 5 in the report.
example.egtrans: 我想将大家的注意力引向报告第5页顶部的图表。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…密切注意, 将注意力引向

example.eg: We don't have cable in this village so we get direct broadcast via satellite.
The pilot is in direct communication with the control tower.
Direct costs include salaries, materials, supplies, and equipment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直接存款, 直接存入银行

example.eg: Everything points in that direction, but there is still not enough direct evidence to know the truth.
I paid extra for a direct flight from Lyon to London.
After a successful internship at Flapjack Inc., Julia was a direct hire from college.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直接劳动, 直接人工

example.eg: The vice president has a direct line to the president.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直达路线, 直线电话

dsense.name: direct mail
dsense.guideword: (advertising sent by mail) (大宗免费投递的邮件，多为广告)

example.eg: The effectiveness of advertising by direct mail depends on the quality of the mailing list.
The direct object comes immediately after the verb.
"It" can be a direct object pronoun in English.
A question mark always comes at the end of a direct question.
Erika is the manager of the department, which has fifteen employees; she has two deputy managers, who are her only direct reports.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直接上级, 直接汇报人
